ValidationRule.description: Must enter Deployment Date when stage field is not equal to Plan or Implement
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.DeveloperName ='Sales_Implementation_Case' &&
(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "Stabilise") || ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Closed - Disengaged") || ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Closed - Maintained") || ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Closed - Rejected")) && ISBLANK ( Deployment_Date__c )
